rounds.category: I CAN NAME THAT PERSON IN 2 WORDS

clues.text: Bachelor president
Tibetan Nobelist
Escapology king
Bavarian pope
Centenarian senator

rounds.comments: (Alex: You name the film in each of the games that we have made up.)

clues.text: A kid's life is in your hands as you play as any one of a dozen jurors; the action is all in one room; sway opinions as No. 8
Befriend Red, collect a Rita Hayworth poster, make your getaway via a sewer level & win by finding hope in the end
Like the film, the game is in real time as you take on the Miller gang as marshal, but try to avoid having Grace Kelly leave you
Be a 14th century knight or take a holiday as death; debate God's existence as you play a chess game within the game
Choose a restaurant, then 1 of the 2 players--Wallace Shawn or the title guy; max your discussion points as you eat
On Feb. 5, 2018 this dropped 1,175 points, its worst closing point decline to that date
This Aussie airline began with biplanes carrying 1 or 2 passengers
Peter Dinklage really spit fire lip-syncing to Busta Rhymes for Blaze Chips from this brand
In January 2018 (after Christmas, thank goodness) this retail chain that kids love said it would close about 180 stores
A business has to control this part of its budget, a term for fixed costs like rent, electric & other expenses
This animal laughed when it saw the cow jump over the moon
They soiled their mittens by eating pie
Her flock disappeared but left their tails behind hanging from a tree to dry
Historically, his "plum" may have been the deed to Mells Manor in Somerset, England
After singing for his supper, he had white bread & butter
The Barones of Long Island
The Crawley family, who lived big in Yorkshire County
The Johnsons, including baby DeVante & twins Jack & Diane
The DiMeos, including son J.J., who has cerebral palsy
So-Cal family the Cohens, who celebrated Chrismukkah
In a battle between them, Ares is defeated by this Greek goddess of war, his female counterpart
In some myths, Eros is the son of this love goddess
This Greek goddess of agriculture has a daughter by Zeus (her brother)
As a baby, this handsome youth was put into the care of Persephone, who later had to share custody
She is both the mother & the wife of Oedipus
Our nation's top judicial body employs this professional fool
Government body that protects the great outdoors & brings color & fabric swatches for the indoors
A 2-time Oscar-winning actor is honored by a 554-foot obelisk
Coffee maker with a plunger that holds briefings for journalists
clues.response: the French press secretary (or the French press room)

clues.text: A disaster-defying breakfast chain that serves pancake alternatives to 435 members
Chimamanda Adichie had a 2014 bestseller with "We Should All Be" these, believers in women's equality
15 years after "Push", this gem of a writer gives voice to Precious' son in "The Kid"
Maryse Cond√© wrote the historical novel "I, Tituba, Black Witch of" this New England town
This British author of "White Teeth" also wrote "Swing Time", a story of 2 childhood friends who dream of being dancers
This "Their Eyes Were Watching God" author wrote "Tell My Horse" after living in Haiti
Vallis, used in the names of planetary gorges, is "valley" in this language
From Hindi for "valley", a dhoon is a type of valley found at the foot of these great mountains
From the Russian for "valley", a doline, a surface collapse of limestone, is better known as this
This Arabic word for "valley" means a ravine that becomes a river during the rainy season
This 8-letter name of an L.A. suburb & a Phoenix suburb is made of 2 different words for "valley"
In the U.S. this type of beer has a maximum alcoholic content of .5%
This Japanese rice drink is listed under "beer" in both Britannica & Encyclopedia Americana
The U.S. imports more beer from this country, the home of Heineken, than any other
Wine is made from substances rich in sugar while beer's ingredients are high in this
Guinness makes a bitter variety & Mackeson a sweet variety of this dark beer
3 of this country's 4 districts are Fontvielle, La Condamine & Monte Carlo
Port cities on this lake include Toledo, Cleveland & Buffalo
This country borders the White Sea on the north & the Black Sea on the south
This region of NW France was founded by Celts fleeing the Anglo-Saxon invasion
There's a neutral zone between Iraq & this large neighbor to its south
She drank the poison that Captain Hook had intended for Peter Pan
In a Kipling story, the camel got his hump by being lazy & making this contemptuous sound
A donkey, a hound, a cat & a cock are these title characters in a Grimm's fairy tale
Chee-Chee the monkey told Dr. Dolittle this was "the rarest animal of the African jungle"
Under the name Victor Appleton, Edward Stratemeyer created the adventures of this inventive boy

rounds.text: The Hippocrene Spring, sacred to the Muses, was so named because this offspring of Medusa brought it into being
